title: chackoge_qrto_rs
text:
title: “ojs” editor: source —

library(DBI)
library(RPostgres)
library(data.table)
con <- dbConnect(
  RPostgres::Postgres(),
  dbname = "chackoge",
  host = "127.0.0.1", 
  port = 5432,
  user = "chackoge"
)

df0 <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM r0_nodelist;")
setDT(df0); df0[,tag:='df0']
df0 <- df0[in_degree > 0]
all_cons <- Filter(function(x) is(x, "DBIConnection"), 
                   lapply(ls(all.names = TRUE), get))
lapply(all_cons, DBI::dbDisconnect)

[[1]]
[1] TRUE

ojs_define(nl = df0)


Transpose
//tnl = transpose(nl)
tnl = transpose(nl).map(d => ({
  ...d,
  in_degree: Number(d.in_degree) 


Plot
myPlot = Plot.plot({
  grid: true,
  y: { 
  type: "log",
  label: "in_degree" },
  marks: [
    Plot.boxY(tnl, {
      x: "type", // Groups within each facet
      y: "in_degree",  // The distribution to plot
      fx: "tag",       // Horizontal facets
      fill: "type"
    })
  ]
})
myPlot


Summary Stats

df0[,as.list(summary(in_degree)),by=c('tag','type')]

      tag   type  Min. 1st Qu. Median     Mean 3rd Qu.   Max.
   <char> <char> <num>   <num>  <num>    <num>   <num>  <num>
1:    df0   seed     1       5      8 15.92337      13 143123
2:    df0  agent     1       5     11 36.14513      23 114591
